content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay for a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 400 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than what I'm looking for. The location and quality of the apartment justify a higher price. How about 550 Euro per month? It's a fair offer considering the amenities and the area.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to pay 500 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's better, but still not quite what I'm hoping for. The apartment is in high demand due to its central location and modern amenities. How about we meet in the middle? 525 Euro per month would be a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 510 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. The apartment is worth more than that. If you're not willing to pay a fair price, I'm afraid we won't be able to come to an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is not satisfactory for you.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand that you're not satisfied with the price, but I'm also not willing to pay more than what I believe is fair. If you're not open to negotiating further, then I'm afraid we won't be able to reach an agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
